Question: Seeing Machines Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Seeing Machines Limited

Guardian Gen 3

- Advanced AI-powered operator monitoring system
- Designed to improve transport safety
- World-leading Aftermarket Driver Monitoring System (DMS)
- Showcased at CES 2024 for private demonstrations

Guardian Gen 3
